name: Mobile Application
description: Cross-platform mobile application project template for iOS/Android using React Native or Flutter

tasks.title: Development Environment Setup
tasks.description: Install and configure mobile development tools (React Native CLI/Flutter SDK, Android Studio, Xcode), set up emulators/simulators, and configure debugging tools

tasks.title: Project Initialization and Structure
tasks.description: Initialize mobile project with proper folder structure, configure navigation library, set up state management (Redux/MobX/Provider), and establish coding standards

tasks.title: UI/UX Design and Component Library
tasks.description: Create mobile-specific design mockups, design responsive layouts for different screen sizes, establish component library, and define app theme and styling system

tasks.title: Core Navigation and Routing
tasks.description: Implement app navigation structure (stack, tab, drawer navigators), deep linking configuration, and navigation state management

tasks.title: Authentication and User Management
tasks.description: Implement user authentication (email/password, social login, biometric), secure token storage, and user profile management screens

tasks.title: API Integration and Data Layer
tasks.description: Set up HTTP client with interceptors, implement API service layer, handle offline mode and data caching, and configure error handling

tasks.title: Core Feature Development - Main Screens
tasks.description: Implement primary app screens and features, integrate with backend APIs, handle loading states and error boundaries

tasks.title: Core Feature Development - Secondary Features
tasks.description: Implement secondary features, settings screens, user preferences, and additional functionality

tasks.title: Native Module Integration
tasks.description: Integrate native device features (camera, GPS, push notifications, contacts, storage) using native modules or third-party libraries

tasks.title: Testing - Unit and Widget Tests
tasks.description: Write unit tests for business logic, widget/component tests, mock external dependencies, and achieve minimum 70% coverage

tasks.title: Testing - Integration and E2E Tests
tasks.description: Implement integration tests for critical user flows, E2E tests using Detox/Appium, and device-specific testing on multiple screen sizes

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize app startup time, implement lazy loading, optimize images and assets, reduce bundle size, and memory leak detection

tasks.title: App Store Preparation
tasks.description: Prepare app store assets (screenshots, icons, descriptions), configure app signing, set up app store listings (App Store Connect, Google Play Console)

tasks.title: Build and Deployment Pipeline
tasks.description: Set up CI/CD for automated builds (Fastlane/Codemagic), configure code signing, and automate deployment to TestFlight/Play Console

tasks.title: App Store Submission and Review
tasks.description: Submit app for review, address feedback from app store review team, and prepare for production release
